document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Palaearctic (excluding Middle East and North Africa) ( Alonso-Zarazaga 2011c )

Biology. Forests, shrublands, meadows. Adults occur in III–VIII. On different herbaceous plants ( Fabaceae :
Vicia
spp., Geraniaceae :
Geranium
spp.), shrubs and trees: Betulaceae :
Alnus
spp.,
Corylus
spp., Fagaceae :
Fagus
spp.,
Quercus
spp., Salicaceae :
Salix
spp. (
S. viminalis
,
S. dasyclados
,
S. caprea
,
Salix
sp.), Rosaceae :
Crataegus
spp.,
Fragaria
spp.,
Geum
spp.,
Sanquisorba
spp.,
Potentilla
spp.,
Rubus
spp.,
Rosa
spp., Cornaceae :
Cornus sanguinea
and other ( Ter-Minasian 1950 ; Dieckmann 1974 )
